articles.title: CIA used secret loopholes to hack phones, TVs, apps: WikiLeaks
articles.description: The Central Intelligence Agency knew about several flaws in software made by Apple, Google and Samsung and others but did not tell the companies about them, WikiLeaks says.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/david-taylor/6529840
articles.title: 'Something's gotta give': Why Trump's presidency could be short-lived
articles.description: Even if you're not vaguely interested in the bond market or well-versed in financial vernacular, the markets (and the peso to a degree) can be read like tea leaves to predict how long President Trump may last in the top job.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/matt-liddy/201998, http://www.abc.net.au/news/catherine-hanrahan/7901852
articles.title: Fewer women run top Australian companies than men named John. Or Peter. Or David.
articles.description: And the number of women in key leadership positions actually fell in 2017.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/penny-timms/6865404
articles.title: 'Angry summer' breaks 205 weather records in 90 days
articles.description: A Climate Council of Australia report warns extreme weather is set to increase until the middle of the century.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/henry-belot/7953986
articles.title: MP disagrees with CBA boss's housing affordability comments
articles.description: The Government appears to be at odds with the head of one of Australia's largest banks over housing affordability in Sydney and Melbourne.

articles.title: Kohli slams Smith after Bangalore review storm
articles.description: India captain Virat Kohli accuses Steve Smith and Australia of crossing the line when reviewing umpire's decisions during the second Test in Bangalore, which the hosts won by 75 runs.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/dan-conifer/5189074
articles.title: Census chiefs unprepared for website crash, FOI documents show
articles.description: Documents obtained by the ABC reveal how unprepared census chiefs were before last year's website meltdown.

articles.title: Five reasons life is hard for women in 2017 (and ways you can help)
articles.description: On International Women's Day, you might assume women have everything they could possibly want in this world, but that's not quite true.

articles.author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/elise--pianegonda/4246604
articles.title: Antarctic floating seminar aims to increase number of women in science
articles.description: A group of female scientists go to the ends of the earth to play their part in smashing the glass ceiling.

articles.title: George Michael died of heart disease, fatty liver
articles.description: George Michael died of natural causes as the result of heart disease and a fatty liver, a British coroner finds.
